data.name: SettingsButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on settings button.

data.name: HelpCardTitleText
data.value: I want to help you! Select or type one of these commands:
data.comment: Title for Help card.

data.name: ErrorMessage
data.value: Something went wrong and I can’t do that right now. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Error message to show to user when error.

data.name: ScrumDetailsButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on scrum details button.

data.name: SettingsTitle
data.comment: Text to show in settings task module.

data.name: SettingsCardTitleText
data.value: Go to Settings to add a new scrum or edit existing ones:
data.comment: Settings card title text.

data.name: ScrumDetailsTitle
data.comment: Scrum details title text in scrum details task module.

data.name: WelcomeCardEndScrumTextDesc
data.value: When you’re done, select End scrum at the bottom of the form. Once you end a scrum, no one can make any more updates to that scrum. Just start a new scrum when you’re ready to get status updates again.
data.comment: End scrum text description in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeCardEndScrumTextHeading
data.comment: Sub heading text for end scrum in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeCardSettingsButtonText
data.comment: Settings button text in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeCardStartScrumTextDesc
data.value: When you ask me to start a scrum, I’ll create a form where people can enter their current status. Everyone can look at these updates.
data.comment: Start scrum text description in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeCardStartScrumTextHeading
data.comment: Sub heading text for start scrum in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeCardSubtitleText
data.value: I help you get status updates from your team. Everyone in the channel can participate.
data.comment: Welcome card subtitle text.

data.name: WelcomeCardTitle
data.comment: Welcome card title text.

data.name: WelcomeCardWantToStartScrumText
data.value: Want to start a scrum now?
data.comment: Want to start a scrum now in welcome card.

data.name: UpdateStatusAnyBlockersPlaceholder
data.comment: Placeholder for any blockers input field on update status task module.

data.comment: Title for any blockers field on update status task module.

data.comment: Validation message for duplicate scrum details on settings page.

data.name: ErrorSavingScrumData
data.value: Something went wrong saving this info. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Error message to show in saving scrum data.

data.name: ErrorUserIsNotPartOfRunningScrumAndTryToEndScrum
data.value: {0}, only members of this scrum can do this. Ask a colleague to add you.
data.comment: Error message to show that user is not part of running scrum and clicks on end scrum.

data.name: UpdateStatusButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on update status button.

data.comment: Title for any blockers field on scrum details task module.

data.comment: Title for today task description field on scrum details task module.

data.comment: Title for yesterday task description field on scrum details task module.

data.name: BotFailureTitle
data.comment: Bot failure title on task module when bot fails.

data.name: TaskModuleInvalidCommandText
data.value: Invalid command for task module fetch activity. Command is: {0}
data.comment: Invalid command text in task module fetch action.

data.name: ScrumStatusCompletedForUser
data.comment: Text for scrum status as "Completed" to be shown for each participants in scrum details task module.

data.name: ScrumStatusNotStarted
data.comment: Text for scrum status as "Not started" to be shown in scrum details task module.

data.name: ScrumDetailsRespondedVsTotalUserStatus
data.comment: Text to show responded vs total user count in scrum details task module.

data.name: StartScrumCardBlockedText
data.comment: Text to show in the middle of the start scrum card when any first status is updated.

data.name: StartScrumCardWelcomeText
data.value: Hey guys! Can't wait to hear from you fellows...
data.comment: Text to show in the middle of the start scrum card when it is sent for the first time in a day.

data.name: ScrumRunningStatusActive
data.comment: Text that represents scrum is active.

data.name: ScrumRunningStatusClosed
data.comment: Text that represents scrum is completed.

data.name: ErrorScrumConfigurationDetailsNullOrInactive
data.value: {0}, this scrum has been deleted or inactive.
data.comment: Error message to show if scrum configuration details are null or scrum is inactive.

data.name: ErrorScrumDoesNotExist
data.comment: Error message to show when scrum does not exist.

data.name: DeleteButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on delete button on settings page.

data.name: ScrumEnableButtonTitle
data.comment: Text to show on scrum enable button on settings page.

data.name: SelectUserPlaceholder
data.comment: Placeholder text for members list dropdown on settings page.

data.name: SuccessMessageAfterEndingScrum
data.value: Nice work! This scrum is completed.
data.comment: Success message to show to user when scrum is ended.

data.name: ScrumDetailsUserIsBlocked
data.comment: Text to show when user is blocked in scrum details task module.

data.name: CancelButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on cancel button on settings page.

data.name: NoMatchesFoundText
data.comment: Text to show when there are no matches to condition.

data.name: ErrorUserIsNotPartOfRunningScrumAndTryUpdateStatus
data.value: {0}, only members of this scrum can do this. Ask a colleague to add you.
data.comment: Error message to show that user is not part of running scrum and clicks on update status.

data.name: ErrorScrumDeleted
data.comment: Error message to show when scrum configuration details have been deleted from storage.

data.name: ErrorNoScrumMembersPresent
data.value: No scrum members present in this scrum.
data.comment: Error message to show when there are no scrum members in the scrum.
